verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:50
verses.text: And the name of Saul’s wife was Ahinoam, the daughter of Ahimaaz: and the name of the captain of his host was Abner, the son of Ner, Saul’s uncle.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:51
verses.text: And Kish was the father of Saul; and Ner the father of Abner was the son of Abiel.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:52
verses.text: And there was sore war against the Philistines all the days of Saul: and when Saul saw any strong man, or any valiant man, he took him unto him.
